objects.text:
• Ultra HD 4K QLED Display
• 34W Dolby Audio System
• Fire OS 8 Smart Platform

product_details.name: Xiaomi 138 cm (55 inch) FX Pro QLED Ultra HD 4K Smart Fire TV L55MB-FPIN
product_details.description:
- Brand: Xiaomi.
- Model: L55MB-FPIN.
- Model Name: L55MB-FPIN.
- Model Year: 2025.
- Product Dimensions: 7.6 x 122.6 x 71.7 cm; 9.1 kg.
- Memory Storage Capacity: 32 GB.
- Ram Memory Installed Size: 2 GB.
- Operating System: Fire OS 8.
- Graphics Coprocessor: Mali-G52 MC1.
- Response Time: 6.5 Milliseconds.
- Resolution: 3840x2160 Pixels.
- Special Features: Built-In Speaker, Chromecast, Bezel-Less Design, Wide Viewing Angle, Eye Comfort Mode.
- Mounting Hardware: Stand, User Manual, Warranty Card, Remote Control, Power Cable.
- Number of items: 7.
- Remote Control Description: One Click Prime, Netflix, Youtube | Alexa Voice Assistant.
- Remote control technology: Bluetooth.
- Display Technology: QLED.
- Standing screen display size: 55 Inches.
- Display Type: HDR 10+.
- Viewing Angle: 178 Degrees.
- Image Aspect Ratio: 16:09.
- Audio input compatible with the item: Earphone Out.
- Audio output mode: Surround.
- Supported audio formats: Dolby/DTS/MP3/FLAC/AAC/OGG/ADPCM/OPUS.
- Speaker Surround Sound Channel Configuration: Dolby Audio.
- Speakers Maximum Output Power: 34 Watts.
- Audio Wattage: 34 Watts.
- Voltage: 130 Volts.
- Power Source: AC.
- Batteries Included: Yes.
- Batteries Required: Yes.
- Battery cell composition: Alkaline.
- Refresh Rate: 60 Hz.
- Total USB ports: 2.
- Connector Type: Wi-Fi, USB, Ethernet, HDMI.
- Mounting Type: Wall Mount & Table Mount.
- Actual viewing angle: 178 Degrees.
- Includes Rechargeable Battery: No.
- Includes remote: Yes.
- Supports Bluetooth Technology: Yes.
- Country of Origin: India.
- Item Weight: 9 kg 100 g.
- Importer: TTE Electronics India Private Limited, Vikruthamala Village, Papanaidupeta Post, Yerpedu Mandal, Tirupati, Vikruthamala Village, Chitt oor, Andhra Pradesh, 5179.
- Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 7.6 x 122.6 x 71.7 Centimeters.
- Net Quantity: 1 Piece.
- Generic Name: Television.

banner_details:
The banner is a modern ecommerce promotional design intended for a flash sale campaign. It features a dynamic split layout with visuals on the right and textual content on the left. The left panel showcases a dramatic contrast using a dark gradient background with glowing orange-accented wave lines. The "tagline" text draws attention to the sales event, while the "heading" text highlights the main product. Below that, the "description" text offers concise product specifications in bullet points. The "price" text is prominently bold, and a vibrant orange "cta_background" with the “cta” text encourages immediate action. On the right, the "product_image" displays the TV prominently for visual appeal.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Black: #0D1117
- Dark Slate: #1A1E25
- Bright Orange: #FF6700
- Soft Orange: #FF9E45
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image of the Xiaomi QLED TV FX Pro 55 effectively utilizes a vibrant and striking color palette to highlight its superior display capabilities. The image prominently features a lively blend of fiery oranges (#FF6A00), deep blues (#003B73), vivid purples (#6A0DAD), and chrome-like silvers (#D4D4D4), creating a high-contrast and visually dynamic background. These colors are smoothly blended through gradients that transition harmoniously while keeping each hue distinct and glowing. The white (#FFFFFF) text adds clarity and a clean contrast against the dark, colorful background. This palette conveys advanced technology, premium quality, and visual brilliance ideal for an advertising banner.
